message:
SYSTEM: 2020.03.OEG.pdf: Página 30
Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Doing a Predoctoral Research Stay but You Were Afraid to Ask
Summary
30
Summary:
1.
Be prepared in advance! (and 
patient).
2.
Check everything carefully.
3.
Don’t be afraid, ASK (or
SPAM).
4.
Do preparations ASAP.
5.
Profit the stay (do not bring
work from home).
6.
Travel while there.
7.
Learn.
8.
Bring all the paperwork you need.
9.
Bring junk food for JARG.
10. Don’t let the collaboration die after the stay.
11. Sign your papers correctly.
12. Give a presentation about what you did ;)
speaker: SYSTEM
